CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 8, 1952, pg. 25 reads: "Expert Shows 'Em How - John Steinhilper, one of the leading bowlers in Greater Pittsburgh Bowling League, was a visitor at the Hillvue Bowling Alleys last week and during his visit there he took time out to demonstrate the style that's enabled him to average190 in that circuit. Shown watching Steinhilper in action are, left to right, "Jap" Washington, Harry Gladden, "Bill" Smith, Eddie Green and William Anderson.-Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: John Steinhilper, bowling, with Jasper "Jap" Washington, Harry Gladden, "Bill" Smith, Eddie Green, and William Anderson looking on, gathered in Hillvue Bowling Alleys
